ComicInfo.Summary:
Not everything is what it seems! The reinvention of the Grimm Universe as a steampunk western continues with this action-packed, exhilarating conclusion. Robyn Hood, renegade outlaw, and her gang of bandits face off against a vengeful Captain Hook. Arrows and bullets will fly! Gears, Gadgets and Gunfights come together in this fun reinvention of the Old West done the Zenescope way!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Renato Rei & Wes Hartman | 1 | B | Cover B | Jamie Tyndall & Ula Mos | 2 | C | Cover C | Joe Pekar & Victor Bartlett | 3 | D | Cover D | Mike Krome & Ula Mos | 4 | Note: The digital edition (3/30/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
